name: Factory Frenzy
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Pilot your Drone to the big shutoff button to disable the factory before you are bombarded with garbage!

WASD to move

Esc to Pause

Turrets can also shoot Goo and Thrusters.

Goo will allow Thrusters to be added to your Drone in the orientation the collide.

The Floor color will help point you in the right direction. Darker colors will lead you to the Giant Button.

Made in 12 hours

Made by Bden and A42PoundMoose
